name: Melonberry Hair Milk Leave-In Conditioner
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:An emollient, silicone-free leave-in conditioner that smooths, moisturizes, detangles, and softens without weighing down fine hair..Hair Type:Fine and Medium.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:.Key Benefits:- Softens Without Weighing Down Hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Kalahari Melon Seed Oil: Intensely hydrates to promote hair growth and target hair loss..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This silicone-free, weightless hair milk features a proprietary melonberry‚Ñ¢ blend of Kalahari melon, red raspberry, and strawberry seed oils which work to hydrate, improve shine, nourish dry scalps, and provide voluminous definition. This leave-in conditioner is formulated for fine hair but efficacious for all hair types..Fragrance Description:This product features a light berry scent..
ingredients: -Kalahari Melon Seed Oil: Intensely hydrates to promote hair growth and target hair loss..-Red Raspberry Seed Oil: Nourishes dry scalps and prevents moisture loss for hydrated, shiny hair..-Strawberry Seed Oil: Encourages a healthy scalp environment and smooths hair to reduce frizz...Water (Aqua), Quaternium-91, Behentrimonium Chloride, Myristyl Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetrimonium Chloride, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum), Panthenol, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Powder. .....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to wet, damp, or dry hair..-Proceed to style as desired. .-Can be used as a leave-in conditioner, light refresher, daily moisturizer, or a one-and-done styler for fine hair. .-Suitable for use on small children.

Also, this product is VERY thick and can't be sprayed out, so I had to plop it out by tapping the bottle into my hand with the top unscrewed. So overall, if they reformulated I would give this another try.

reviews.review_title: Probably better for less textured/damaged hair...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light weight leave in conditioner product.  The first thing I can comment on is the smell--it is fruity scented in a yogurt sort of way.  I think kids would enjoy it.  As an adult, though the scent is pleasant, I am glad that it doesn't linger as this is not how I would like to smell.  My hair is quite porous and doesn't retain the smell of any products well, so this may not be the case for you.  In general, I found that it did help a little bit with detangling and with hydration.  I wish that it had heat protectant added as well, but the packaging doesn't imply that.  I found that the product is not sufficiently detangling for my hair, nor does it really reduce frizz, but I have incredibly difficult hair.  My hair is fine, curly, and quite damaged from years of fighting my natural texture.  I do heat style regularly and in the photo you see the result after blow drying and lightly smoothing with a flat iron on low heat.  I do like that the product doesn't seem to build up or weigh my hair down, but I just need something more potent.

reviews.review_text: The point off is because the sprayer is constantly clogged. Since the conditioner is thick it doesn't loosen up enough to come through the sprayer very well. Otherwise I love it. I have fine, colored, dry hair and this (in small amounts at a time so you don't overdo it) makes my hair so soft and looks amazing!  And the smell is amazing too. I love my hair smelling like this. I haven't found a leave in conditioner that doesn't weigh my fine hair down and doesn't make it look and feel wonderful until I used this. Well worth the money!

Now for the cons‚Ä¶ the pump just isn‚Äôt very good so I just sprayed it in my hand and dispersed the product through my hair evenly and it‚Äôs not a deal breaker but it really doesn‚Äôt take the frizz but I will say I do have quite the fly always and fine hair is very hard to tame frizz! reviews.review_title: Love this product can be used so many different wa
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would like to thank Influenster and Adwoa Beauty for allowing me the opportunity to participate in this incentivized campaign.  I love this product to me it reminds me very much of its a ten I'm sorry to use another Brand's name but I haven't had this much love for product like this since that and I think I like it even more with this product it is nice and dense and it allows me to smooth my hair roots in between blowouts allowing me to extend the time in between flat iron treatments. Also this formula has just the right amount of water to incorporate into flat ironed hair without the hair reverting it gives just enough moisture to nourish the hair but not enough for it to come undone especially if you have a keratin treatment or straightening treatment this product allows you to seal those ends and moisturize them at the same time it's like the lock method All in One. The way I use this product is when I first wash my hair I will run this product in before I blow dry it helps my blow dry become more sleek and smooth then as my hair starts to dry out 3 to 4 days after having my hair blowing out I'm beginning to add moisture to my hair with this cream on the ends and The Roots especially if it's been a while since I've had keratin treatment this cream allows me to smooth my edges and smooth them down and put my hair in a nice clean bun. Until wash day I'm able to put this on my hair repeatedly before feeling my hair weighed down. High porosity Naturals out there if you ever find yourself using this product and your hair is way down and you're finding it difficult to kind of get through your hair just put a little light oil on your hair and your hair will move just like normal. You just need to move some of those heavier fatty acids around. I love this cream it is more dense and less watery I like this when my hair needs a bit of hydration but I don't want to spray something that feels like water
